caption: Pharmacokinetic parameters of levetiracetam in our study compared with historical data
footnote: Cmax, maximum plasma concentration; Tmax, time to maximum concentration; AUC0–12, area under the curve from time 0 to 12 h; Ctrough, trough plasma concentration. Compared with historical data by Fountain, et al. [18]. Compared with historical data. T-test used to assess data. Too small sample to compare to historical data. Median (range); all other data expressed as mean (±standard deviation). Non-normally distributed data.
